## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description  | Type                              | Default    |
| -------- | --------- | ------------ | --------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `shape`  | `shape`   | Button shape | `"circle" \| "normal" \| "round"` | `'normal'` |
| `type`   | `type`    | Button type  | `"normal" \| "primary" \| "text"` | `'normal'` |
